alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 1:10PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Florence, west central Horry, Marion and northeastern Williamsburg Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 106 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms from Pamplico to 10 miles south of Gresham to Stuckey, moving northeast at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Hemingway, Sellers, Galivants Ferry, Blue Brick, Hyman, Hannah, Poston, Brittons Neck, Rains, Gresham, Friendfield, Claussen, Evergreen, Henry, Kingsburg, Francis Marion University and Stuckey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
